name: Cleanup on Spaceship 4
description:
Melvin is an alien space-janitor with a nervous disposition. He's just spent the morning wishing he could be more like his dashing and courageous captain, Pluto. And as if that wasn't a rough start to the day - his is about to get a whole lot worse. Join Melvin on a journey to conquer his fears and rescue his crewmates!

Conceptualized, designed and created in less than 3 days between 2nd and 5th April 2021, for Mini Jam 77. Made by Synrelis and ajfrost.

Installation Instructions: Extract both files to same location, and run exe.
